script.name: plugin.mini.game.decrypt
script.sourceplaintext:
* ************************************************ * SCRIPT NAME: plugin.mini.game * DESCRIPTION: Hacking mini-game: Decryption (Anagrams) * Requires plugin.mini.game.menu.loop. * * AUTHOR: DrBullwinkle DATE: 11 December 2012 * ************************************************
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - * Defaults $PageID = 8558 $Debug = get global variable: name='gv.bw.debug' * $Debug = 'ON' if $Debug == 'ON' write to log file #$PageID append=1 value=' - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - plugin.mini.game.decrypt - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ' end
* Constants. $c.color.none = read text: page=$PageID id=33 $c.color.cyan = read text: page=$PageID id=34 $c.color.red = read text: page=$PageID id=35 $c.color.yellow = read text: page=$PageID id=36 $c.color.green = read text: page=$PageID id=37 $c.color.white = read text: page=$PageID id=38 $c.color.blue = read text: page=$PageID id=39 $c.color.magenta = read text: page=$PageID id=32 $c.color.orange = read text: page=$PageID id=31 $c.menu.ok = read text: page=$PageID id=2003 $c.menu.ok = $c.color.green + $c.menu.ok + $c.color.none $c.cancel.text = read text: page=$PageID id=2004 $c.cancel.text = $c.color.red + $c.cancel.text + $c.color.none $c.menu.restart = read text: page=$PageID id=2005 $c.menu.restart = $c.color.green + $c.menu.restart + $c.color.none $c.text.code = read text: page=$PageID id=2007 $c.text.stage = read text: page=$PageID id=2008 $c.text.time = read text: page=$PageID id=2009 $c.text.find.password = read text: page=$PageID id=2010 $c.text.hack.password = read text: page=$PageID id=2011 $c.text.sorry.you.lose = read text: page=$PageID id=2012 $c.text.success = read text: page=$PageID id=1591 $c.text.you.entered = read text: page=$PageID id=2013 $c.text.correct.answer.was = read text: page=$PageID id=2014 $c.use.easy.anagram = read text: page=$PageID id=51 $c.use.hard.anagram = read text: page=$PageID id=52 $c.chance.easy = read text: page=$PageID id=55 $c.chance.easy = string $c.chance.easy to integer $c.page7.min = read text: page=$PageID id=57 $c.page7.min = string $c.page7.min to integer $c.page7.max = read text: page=$PageID id=58 $c.page7.max = string $c.page7.max to integer $c.menu.cancel = -1 $c.menu.cancel.all = -2 $c.menu.no.select = 0 $c.sound.clock.tick = 982 $c.sound.electric.beep = 924 $c.sound.radar.beep = 972 $c.sound.electric.fizzle = 971 $c.sound.menu.two.tone = 968 $c.sound.cargo.eject = 964 $c.sound.docking.bay.arms.extended = 963 $c.sound.electric.arcing = 962 $c.sound.menu.ok = 955 $c.sound.klaxon = 925 $c.sound.buzzer = 929 $c.sound.tri.tone.beep = 1124 $c.sound.check.click = 1119 $c.sound.dtmf.error = 1118 $c.sound.bloop.bloop.bleep = 1114 $c.sound.promotion.alert = 1100 $c.sound.detector = 986 $c.sound.clocktick = 982 $c.sound.sonar = 1008 $c.sound.radar = 972
* Setup $menu.height = 12 $text.user = '' $won = -1 * - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
if not $answer * Choose difficulty. $rnd = random value from 1 to 102 - 1 $rnd = $rnd - 1 if $rnd <= $c.chance.easy * Easy: Sector Names. $page = 7 $textid.min = $c.page7.min $textid.max = $c.page7.max else * Hard: Phrases from t file. $page = $PageID $textid.min = 101 $textid.max = 199 end
$rnd = random value from $textid.min to $textid.max - 1 $is.error = 1 while $is.error >= 0 $text.correct.solution = read text: page=$page id=$rnd $is.error = find position of pattern 'ReadText' in $text.correct.solution $rnd = random value from $textid.min to $textid.max - 1 @ = wait 1 ms end
* Encrypt the string (make an anagram). gosub MakeAnagram
* Save the solution and the encrypted version. set global variable: name='8558.text.encrypted' value=$text.encrypted set global variable: name='8558.text.correct.solution' value=$text.correct.solution
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Restart: * Instructions and Preview. * Generate a Split name. $is.error = 1 while $is.error >= 0 $rnd = random value from 693000 to 693023 - 1 $1 = read text: page=32 id=$rnd $is.error = find position of pattern 'ReadText' in $1 @ = wait 1 ms end $2 = read text: page=32 id=693100 $is.error = 1 while $is.error >= 0 $rnd = random value from 693200 to 693218 - 1 $3 = read text: page=32 id=$rnd $is.error = find position of pattern 'ReadText' in $3 @ = wait 1 ms end $author = $1 + ' ' + $2 + $3
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Menu.Main: * Retrieve saved solution and encrypted text in case player pauses. $text.encrypted = get global variable: name='8558.text.encrypted' $text.correct.solution = get global variable: name='8558.text.correct.solution' $text.user = get global variable: name='8558.text.user' if not $text.user * An empty guess should look empty. $text.user = '' end @ $text.user.lc = null -> call script plugin.mini.game.lower.case : String will be converted to Lower Case=$text.user @ $text.correct.solution.lc = null -> call script plugin.mini.game.lower.case : String will be converted to Lower Case=$text.correct.solution
* Menu Text. * $menu.description = 'Decryption' * $menu.title = 'Decrypt the following phrase: ' + $c.color.yellow + $text.encrypted + $c.color.none * $menu.blank.line = '' * $menu.separator = '_________________________________________________________' * $menu.rule1 = '1) Choose "Begin Decryption" to enter your solution. Then, when ready, ' * $menu.rule2 = '2) Select "Submit Your Solution" to submit your solution for validation.' * $menu.rule3 = 'You may pause the hack at any time by selecting "Pause and Save". ' * $menu.rule4 = 'A message will be placed in your inbox that will allow you to resume the hack when you are ready.' * $menu.rule5 = 'You may also "Cancel" which immediately forfeits the hack.' * $menu.button.begin = 'Begin Decryption' * $menu.solution.proposed = 'Your Solution: ' + $c.color.cyan + $text.user + $c.color.none * $menu.button.submit = 'Submit Your Solution' * $menu.button.pause = 'Pause and Save' * $menu.button.cancel = 'Cancel'
$menu.description = read text: page=$PageID id=3001 * $menu.title = 'Decrypt the following phrase: ' + $c.color.yellow + $text.encrypted + $c.color.none $menu.title = read text: page=$PageID id=3002 $menu.title = sprintf: fmt=$menu.title, $text.encrypted, null, null, null, null $menu.title.top = read text: page=$PageID id=3013 $menu.blank.line = '' $menu.separator = '_________________________________________________________' $menu.rule1 = read text: page=$PageID id=3003 $menu.rule2 = read text: page=$PageID id=3004 $menu.rule3 = read text: page=$PageID id=3005 $menu.rule4 = read text: page=$PageID id=3006 $menu.rule5 = read text: page=$PageID id=3007 $menu.phrase = $c.color.cyan + $text.encrypted + $c.color.none
* Has player entered a solution? if $text.user == '' * Begin is Green $menu.button.begin = read text: page=$PageID id=3008 $menu.button.begin = $c.color.green + $menu.button.begin + $c.color.none
* Proposed Solution is Gray $menu.solution.proposed = read text: page=$PageID id=3009 $menu.solution.proposed = sprintf: fmt=$menu.solution.proposed, $text.user, null, null, null, null
* Submit is Gray $menu.button.submit = read text: page=$PageID id=3010 else * Begin is Orange $menu.button.begin = read text: page=$PageID id=3008 $menu.button.begin = $c.color.orange + $menu.button.begin + $c.color.none
* Proposed Solution is White $menu.solution.proposed = read text: page=$PageID id=3009 $menu.solution.proposed = sprintf: fmt=$menu.solution.proposed, $text.user, null, null, null, null $menu.solution.proposed = $c.color.white + $menu.solution.proposed + $c.color.none
* Submit is Green $menu.button.submit = read text: page=$PageID id=3010 $menu.button.submit = $c.color.green + $menu.button.submit + $c.color.none end $menu.button.pause = read text: page=$PageID id=3011 $menu.button.cancel = read text: page=$PageID id=3012
* Build the Menu. $menu = create custom menu array add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$menu.blank.line add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$menu.rule1 add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$menu.rule2 add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$menu.separator add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$menu.rule3 add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$menu.rule4 add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$menu.separator add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$menu.rule5 add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$menu.separator add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$menu.phrase add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$menu.blank.line add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$menu.button.begin returnvalue='begin' add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$menu.blank.line add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$menu.solution.proposed add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$menu.blank.line add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$menu.button.submit returnvalue='submit' add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$menu.button.pause returnvalue='pause' add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$menu.button.cancel returnvalue='cancel'
* Show Menu set menu option: $menu, maximum menu height=18 lines @ $menu.retval = open custom menu: title=$menu.title.top description=$menu.description option array=$menu
if $menu.retval == 'begin' * Display the text box. play sample $c.sound.check.click gosub Puzzle.Show * Save Player's current guess, if any. set global variable: name='8558.text.user' value=$text.user goto label Menu.Main else if $menu.retval == 'submit' * Test the answer. play sample $c.sound.menu.ok gosub Validate.Solution else if $menu.retval == 'pause' * Send Incoming Question then exit. * Instructions and Incoming Question $msg = sprintf: pageid=$PageID textid=2001, $author, $text.encrypted, [TRUE], null, null send incoming question $msg to player: callback=plugin.mini.game.decrypt * Neither win nor lose -- Pause = -2: $won = -2 else if $menu.retval == 'cancel' * Exit without failure notice. gosub Cleanup $won = -1 else if $menu.retval < 0 * Player pressed "Esc" or "Del". Exit quietly gosub Cleanup $won = -1 else * Unexpected response. Log and quit. write to log file #$PageID append=1 printf: fmt='Unexpected return from menu: %s', $menu.retval, null, null, null, null gosub Cleanup $won = -1 end
return $won
else if $answer == 'ok' * Called by callback from incoming question. goto label Restart
end
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - return $won * - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - MakeAnagram: if $c.use.easy.anagram != 'yes' AND $c.use.hard.anagram != 'yes' * Bad t file. Use both. else if $c.use.easy.anagram == 'yes' AND $c.use.hard.anagram == 'yes' * Use both. else if $c.use.hard.anagram != 'yes' * Use Easy. @ $text.encrypted = null -> call script plugin.mini.game.anagram.create : Text to Encrypt=$text.correct.solution endsub else if $c.use.easy.anagram != 'yes' * Use Hard. @ $text.encrypted = null -> call script plugin.mini.game.anagram.create.full.scramble : Text to Encrypt=$text.correct.solution endsub else * Use both. end
$rnd = random value from 1 to 102 - 1 if $rnd < $c.chance.easy * Easy @ $text.encrypted = null -> call script plugin.mini.game.anagram.create : Text to Encrypt=$text.correct.solution else * Hard @ $text.encrypted = null -> call script plugin.mini.game.anagram.create.full.scramble : Text to Encrypt=$text.correct.solution end
endsub * - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Cleanup: * Clear the saved variables. set global variable: name='8558.text.encrypted' value=null set global variable: name='8558.text.correct.solution' value=null set global variable: name='8558.text.user' value=null endsub * - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Puzzle.Show: $text.encrypted = get global variable: name='8558.text.encrypted' $text.correct.solution = get global variable: name='8558.text.correct.solution'
* Show the puzzle. $msg = read text: page=$PageID id=2000 $msg = $msg + $c.color.cyan + $text.encrypted + $c.color.none
$text.user = null -> get user input: type=Var/String, title=$msg
* Convert both Solution and User Response to Lower Case. @ $text.correct.solution.lc = null -> call script plugin.mini.game.lower.case : String will be converted to Lower Case=$text.correct.solution @ $text.user.lc = null -> call script plugin.mini.game.lower.case : String will be converted to Lower Case=$text.user endsub * - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Validate.Solution: if $text.user.lc == $text.correct.solution.lc $msg = $c.color.cyan + $c.text.success + $c.color.none send incoming message $msg to player: type:[Log.Alert], display it=[TRUE], log it=null $won = 1
* If we arrived here after a pause, then we will not return to main plugin.mini.game. Therefore, handle DSD reward here. if $answer == 'ok' play sample $c.sound.check.click = [PLAYERSHIP] -> add 2 units of Data Storage Device end else if $text.user == -1 OR $text.user == '' $text.user = '___' else if is datatype[ $text.user ] == DATATYPE_NULL $text.user = '___' end $msg = $c.color.red + $c.text.sorry.you.lose + $c.color.none + ' ' + $c.text.you.entered + $text.user + ' ' + $c.text.correct.answer.was + $text.correct.solution * /// Consider MessageBox here. * send incoming message $msg to player: display it=1 $msg = $c.text.you.entered + $text.user + ' ' + $c.text.correct.answer.was + $text.correct.solution write to log file #$PageID append=1 value=$msg $won = 0
* If we arrived here after a pause, then we will not return to main plugin.mini.game. Therefore, handle DSD reward here. if $answer == 'ok' * Fail play sample $c.sound.buzzer = [PLAYERSHIP] -> add 1 units of Data Storage Device end end
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - if $Debug == 'ON' $dsds = [PLAYERSHIP] -> get amount of ware Data Storage Device in cargo bay write to log file #$PageID append=1 printf: fmt='Decrypt: DSDs=%s', $dsds, null, null, null, null end * - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
gosub Cleanup endsub * - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - return $won * - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

comment.var: Save the solution and the encrypted version.
Retrieve saved solution and encrypted text in case player pauses.
An empty guess should look empty.

line.text: String will be converted to Lower Case=
String will be converted to Lower Case=

comment.var: $menu.rule1 = '1) Choose "Begin Decryption" to enter your solution. Then, when ready, '
$menu.rule2 = '2) Select "Submit Your Solution" to submit your solution for validation.'
$menu.rule3 = 'You may pause the hack at any time by selecting "Pause and Save". '
$menu.rule4 = 'A message will be placed in your inbox that will allow you to resume the hack when you are ready.'
$menu.rule5 = 'You may also "Cancel" which immediately forfeits the hack.'

add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu info line to array

add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu info line to array

add custom menu item to array
add custom menu item to array
add custom menu item to array

Convert both Solution and User Response to Lower Case.

send incoming message $msg to player: display it=1

An empty guess should look empty.

$menu.rule4 = 'A message will be placed in your inbox that will allow you to resume the hack when you are ready.'
$menu.rule5 = 'You may also "Cancel" which immediately forfeits the hack.'
